amendment.description: To fully fund the Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 230 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 31. Record Vote Number: 66.

action.text: Amendment SA 230 proposed by Senator Coleman. (consideration: CR S2894-2897, s2924; text: CR S2894-2895) To fully fund the Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 230 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 31. Record Vote Number: 66.
